title: Without education, can we do any business? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes , anyone can start business without education but,  He/she should have the knowledge related to the business , official education like going to school , University, etc are not necessary but unofficial education like reading biography , autobiography, business books , personality development etc is necessary for running a successful career in business . But basic education is must required for a business, If you start a business you must know all the fundamentals related to your business, You must try to discover loopholes of your business, try to manage people, I know people who were college, school dropouts, yet they build a successful business So official education is not necessary but with help of unofficial education one can start a business. Thanks for giving your precious time If you find me right please UPVOTE Do Follow me Radhe Radhe 🔔 Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo-mu_BrjYRAAJwUriCkJNQ

Why not, business like a trick.This trick found without education and we can create own idea or style.We have have a knowledge how to purchasing our product and telling about his benefits for customers that's enough
